name: Fear The Cooks
description:
This is a project made by 3 students in first year of gaming studies (it's our first project^^)

We are from the UCO (Université Catholique de l'Ouest) in France.

WHO WE ARE :

Joël Garcia : programming, VFX and other works on Unity

Luc Amorim--Frigout : Graphics in-game and level design

Remy Barbillon : Animations, UI and Music

PITCH : You play here the role of a rat trying to escape a kitchen in 1930.

This was made in 2 weeks with the following constraints :

- category runner in pixel art

-  resolution inferior than 512 x 488

- make one level of around 1 minute

- color palette inferior than 16 colors

The controls are very simple : Space to start and restart, Up Arrow to jump, Down Arrow to slide and Escape to pause the game.

We hope you'll enjoy it and don't hesitate to give your opinion and advices about the game^^

Thanks from the Fear The™ Production

P.S : Let us know if you succeeded to collect every cheese by  telling us what happens in-game  ;)   (good luck)
